languages.text: "Вины священного механизма в инциденте нет — все необходимые литании запуска и обслуживания соблюдены. Гипотеза: причиной аварии послужила чрезмерная масса единицы Ульфар".

"The sacred mechanism is not to blame for this incident. All required litanies of actuation and maintenance have been performed. Hypothesis: the cause of the failure was the excessive mass of the unit Ulfar."
languages.original_text: "Вины священного механизма в инциденте нет — все необходимые литании запуска и обслуживания соблюдены. Гипотеза: причиной аварии послужила чрезмерная масса единицы Ульфар".

traits.locale_text: "The sacred mechanism is not to blame for this incident. All required litanies of launch and maintenance have been performed. Hypothesis: the cause of the failure was the excessive mass of Unit Ulfar."

languages.text: "Den heiligen Mechanismus trifft keine Schuld an diesem Vorfall. Sämtliche erforderlichen Litaneien der Inbetriebnahme und Wartung wurden durchgeführt. Hypothese: Die Ursache für das Versagen war die übermäßige Masse der Einheit Ulfar."
languages.original_text: "The sacred mechanism is not to blame for this incident. All required litanies of actuation and maintenance have been performed. Hypothesis: the cause of the failure was the excessive mass of the unit Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: "Den heiligen Mechanismus trifft keine Schuld an diesem Vorfall. Sämtliche erforderlichen Litaneien der Inbetriebnahme und Wartung wurden durchgeführt. Hypothese: Die Ursache für das Versagen war die übermäßige Masse der Einheit Ulfar."

languages.text: « Le mécanisme sacré n'est pas responsable de cet incident. Toutes les litanies d'activation et de maintenance nécessaires ont été dûment récitées. Hypothèse : l'origine de la panne n'est autre que le surpoids de l'unité Ulfar. »
languages.original_text: "The sacred mechanism is not to blame for this incident. All required litanies of actuation and maintenance have been performed. Hypothesis: the cause of the failure was the excessive mass of the unit Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: « Le mécanisme sacré n'est pas responsable de cet incident. Toutes les litanies d'activation et de maintenance nécessaires ont été dûment récitées. Hypothèse : l'origine de la panne n'est autre que le surpoids de l'unité Ulfar. »

languages.text: «El mecanismo sagrado no ha tenido la culpa. Las letanías de actuación y mantenimiento se han realizado adecuadamente. Hipótesis: la causa del fracaso se debe a la elevada masa de la unidad Ulfar».
languages.original_text: "The sacred mechanism is not to blame for this incident. All required litanies of actuation and maintenance have been performed. Hypothesis: the cause of the failure was the excessive mass of the unit Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: «El mecanismo sagrado no ha tenido la culpa. Las letanías de actuación y mantenimiento se han realizado adecuadamente. Hipótesis: la causa del fracaso se debe a la elevada masa de la unidad Ulfar».

languages.text: 「神聖なメカニズムに今回の事故の責任はない。必要な作動とメンテナンスはすべて行われている。仮説：故障の原因はウルファー部隊の過大な質量にある」
languages.original_text: "The sacred mechanism is not to blame for this incident. All required litanies of actuation and maintenance have been performed. Hypothesis: the cause of the failure was the excessive mass of the unit Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: 「神聖なメカニズムに今回の事故の責任はない。必要な作動とメンテナンスはすべて行われている。仮説：故障の原因はウルファー部隊の過大な質量にある」

languages.text: “发生这样的事故，不能归咎于神圣的机械，因为所有驱动与维护流程都已经按照要求完成了。提出假设：发生事故的原因是乌尔法这个单位的质量过大。”
languages.original_text: "The sacred mechanism is not to blame for this incident. All required litanies of actuation and maintenance have been performed. Hypothesis: the cause of the failure was the excessive mass of the unit Ulfar."

traits.locale_text: “发生这样的事故，不能归咎于神圣的机械，因为所有驱动与维护流程都已经按照要求完成了。提出假设：发生事故的原因是乌尔法这个单位的质量过大。”

languages.original_text: "The sacred mechanism is not to blame for this incident. All required litanies of actuation and maintenance have been performed. Hypothesis: the cause of the failure was the excessive mass of the unit Ulfar."

languages.text: "Bu vakada kutsal mekanizmanın suçu bulunmamakta. Gerekli tüm hareket ilahileri söylendi ve bakım işlemleri gerçekleştirildi. Varsayım: Hata nedeni, Ulfar biriminin devasa cüssesi."
languages.original_text: "The sacred mechanism is not to blame for this incident. All required litanies of actuation and maintenance have been performed. Hypothesis: the cause of the failure was the excessive mass of the unit Ulfar."
